title: Lynda - Hard Surface Sculpting and Retopologizing in CINEMA 4D

Lynda - Hard Surface Sculpting and Retopologizing in CINEMA 4D 

Subject:	3D + Animation 
Software:	CINEMA 4D 
Author:	Adam Trachtenberg 

2h 35m Advanced Mar 17, 2015 | Uploaded in Apr 19, 2015 Via Webcentara

Using CINEMA 4D's sculpting tools, you can create hard surface models without the constraints imposed by traditional polygon and NURBS modeling techniques. Then you can retopologize your sculpt to produce a lighter model more suitable for complex scenes and animation.
